GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
driver core: fix potential deadlock in __driver_attach

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 8191b6cd9ada09b675f17446d5872eb1f77685cb, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit ef0ff68351be4fd83bec2d797f0efdc0174a55a4. For more details please see the references link.
